name: TheySaidSoDailyInspirationalQuote

Developer Terms of Use
des: They Said So is an inspirational platform with quotes, poems and speeches. This skill allows you to get daily inspirational quote from They Said So as part of your news brief. Get inspired by hand picked inspirational quote.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
